Trait - XPSPL\Storage¶

Storage trait.

The Storage trait is designed to allow objects to act as a storage, the trait only provides an interface to the normal PHP functions used for transversing an array, keeping all data within a central storage.

See the PHP Manual for more information regarding the functions used in this trait.

Methods¶

storage¶

storage()

Returns the current storage array.

Return type:array

merge¶

merge()

Merge an array with the current storage.

Return type:void

walk¶

walk()

Apply the given function to every node in storage.

Parameters:callable –
Return type:void
